BBEX3.M.HNL.USD.CA.AA.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Honduras / USD 1 = HNL ... (buying)
General: Until 25 March 1991, an exchange rate of USD 1 = HNL 2 applied to the servicing of government debt.
Source: Since March 2003: Banco Central de Honduras, Tegucigalpa 1991 - February 2003: Dresdner Bank Lateinamerika AG, Hamburg (formerly: Deutsch-Südamerikanische Bank AG).
Comment on 1992-06: Exchange rate on 19 June 1992.
Comment on 1994-03: Exchange rate on 25 March 1994.
Comment on 1998-06: Exchange rate on 26 June 1998.
Comment on 1998-08: Exchange rate on 28 August 1998.
Comment on 1998-10: Exchange rate on 6 November 1998.
Comment on 2000-01: Exchange rate on 21 January 2000.
